name: GooglePlayRelease
description: Release an app to the Google Play Store
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Google Play service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: serviceAccountKey
inputs.label: JSON Key Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON file provided by Google Play that includes the service account's identity you wish to publish your APK under.

inputs.name: apkFile
inputs.label: APK Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the APK file you want to publish to the specified track. Wildcards can be used. For example, _\*\*/\*.apk_ to match the first APK file, in any directory.

inputs.name: track
inputs.label: Track
inputs.helpMarkDown: Track you want to publish the APK to.

inputs.name: userFraction
inputs.label: Rollout Fraction
inputs.helpMarkDown: The percentage of users to roll the specified APK out to.

inputs.name: changeLogFile
inputs.label: Release Notes (File)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file specifying the release notes (change log) for the APK you are publishing.

inputs.name: shouldAttachMetadata
inputs.label: Update Metadata
inputs.helpMarkDown: Checking this box will make the task attempt to update the metadata on your app release.

inputs.name: metadataRootPath
inputs.label: Metadata Root Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the metadata folder with the fastlane metadata structure.

inputs.name: shouldUploadApks
inputs.label: Update APK(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default, the task will update the specified binary APK file(s) on your app release. Unselecting this option you can update metadata keeping the APKs untouched.

inputs.name: additionalApks
inputs.label: Additional APK Path(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Paths to additional APK files you want to publish to the specified track (e.g. an x86 build). Wildcards can be used. For example, _\*\*/\*.apk_ to match all APK files, in any directory.

inputs.name: versionCodeFilterType
inputs.label: Replace version codes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify version codess to replace in the selected track with the new APKs: all, the comma separated list, or a minimatch regilar expression pattern.

inputs.name: replaceList
inputs.label: Version code list
inputs.helpMarkDown: The comma separated list of APK version codes to be removed from the track with this deployment.

inputs.name: replaceExpression
inputs.label: Version code pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The regular expression pattern to select a list of APK version codes to be removed from the track with this deployment, e.g. .*12?(3|4)?5 .
